translation.en: They had ceased advancing.
He was released and allowed to continue.
He refused her gift of the apple.
They left the city.
They were exhausted.
She feared they might get hurt.
A new option was available to them.
The journey was tiring.
The child kept trying.
translation.tam: Zima at Anzo. Zima and Bakor.

translation.en: They assaulted their foe.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army. With fist closed.

translation.en: When they tried together, they were able to lift the heavy rock.
It wasn't obvious what she should do next.
They offered him a bandage.
The work was halted until they would decide to continue.
She felt better.
He pleaded for it.
He had supper.
It was clear what his next action should be.
They were ignorant of any scientific facts or observations.
The audience was ready for the story to start.
translation.tam: Kira at court, the court filled.

translation.en: He intentionally eavesdropped on what was said.
He hadn't asked for assistance.
They haggled back and forth for some time on a price.
There was nothing that could be done to help him.
Her task was challenging.
She discovered something surprising.
They had a lot to do.
His illness caused quite a bit of pain.
translation.tam: Zinda! His face black. His eyes red.

translation.en: He lifted the veil off it.
He liked it.
Though he lost his job, he still had a family to provide for.
The machine malfunctioned, causing quite a bit of damage.
Hey.
She asked him to tell her about it.
He confirmed it.
They stood in the open to attract their foe.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army at Lashmir. With fist open.

translation.en: She couldn't comprehend what they were trying to tell her.
He asked if they wanted to come into his home.
translation.tam: Chatha and Terubim, the fire warm.

translation.en: She needed sleep.
She assisted the group.
She refused her friend's help.
The plane needed a pilot, and that was her.
He wanted to leave, but they held him back.
The work was advancing.
The results were beyond reproach.
translation.tam: Chenza at court. The court of silence.

translation.en: They stopped worrying once the task was completed.
He recognized clearly what he couldn't see before.
The plane wouldn't take off.
They checked if he was hungry.
They were unsure where to search for the object.
